NK040(thi)007:1: // zab mo gcod kyi slob brgyud kyi gsol 'debs bsdus pa bzhugs /
NK040(thi)007:2: yum chen sher phyin sh+aakya seng+ge dang /
NK040(thi)007:3: 'jam dpal smra seng ar+ya ta re ma /
NK040(thi)007:4: su kha sid+d+hi ar+ya de ba dang /
NK040(thi)007:5: dam pa rgya gar rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK040(thi)007:6: skyo ston bsod nams ma cig lab kyi sgron //
NK040(thi)007:7: khu sgom chos seng dol pa zang thal dang //
NK040(thi)007:8: rgya nag gcer bu sangs rgyas rab ston dang //
NK040(thi)007:9: zal mo dge slong rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK040(thi)007:10: zhen med ras pa sangs rgyas gnyen ston dang //
NK040(thi)007:11: ras pa chos seng badz+ra seng+ha dang //
NK040(thi)007:12: pra dz+ny+aa gu ru rje btsun dpal 'bar ba //
NK040(thi)007:13: nam mkha' rdo rje rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK040(thi)007:14: tshul khrims rgyal mtshan chos kyi rdo rje dang //
NK040(thi)007:15: ye shes rgyal mtshan kun dga' 'bum pa dang //
NK040(thi)007:16: bsod nams 'bum pa rdo rje 'od zer dang //
NK040(thi)007:17: nam mkha' rdo rje rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK040(thi)007:18: nam mkha' blo gros ka la badz+ra dang //
NK040(thi)007:19: 'khrul zhig rang grol chos skyong rgya mtsho dang //
NK040(thi)007:20: klong gsal snying po rtogs ldan lu gu dang //
NK040(thi)007:21: bkra shis phun tshogs rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK040(thi)007:22: nam mkha' rgya mtsho dri med zhing skyong mgon //
NK040(thi)007:23: tshe dbang mchog grub kun bzang nges don dbang //
NK040(thi)007:24: 'gyur med bstan 'dzin chos kyi blo gros dang //
NK040(thi)007:25: kun bzang 'gyur med rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK040(thi)007:26: bshad sgrub bstan pa'i nyi ma chos kyi rje //
NK040(thi)007:27: rdo rje legs bshad 'dus pa rtsal chen dang //
NK040(thi)007:28: drin chen rtsa ba'i bla ma la sogs pa'i //
NK040(thi)007:29: zab mo gcod brgyud rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
NK040(thi)007:30: thog bcas thog med dga' brod snyems byed bdud //
NK040(thi)007:31: bdud bzhi tshar gcod snyems thag nang nas chod //
NK040(thi)007:32: bdag 'dzin blos thang bdag med mngon du gyur //
NK040(thi)007:33: gzung 'dzin mdud grol ma rig 'khrul pa sangs //
NK040(thi)007:34: na tsha bog thon rkyen ngan lam du slong //
NK040(thi)007:35: dgos med rgyud skye gnyan sa ri khrod 'grim //
NK040(thi)007:36: 'gro don mthar phyin stong nyid snying rje spyod //
NK040(thi)007:37: bdag don chos sku gzhan don gzugs sku thob //
NK040(thi)007:38: 'khor ba dong sprugs phrin las mthar phyin shog /
NK040(thi)007:40: lam 'dir snying nas mos byed pa //
NK040(thi)007:41: sa man+ta yis sug bris spel //
NK040(thi)007:42: dge bas yum chen mngon gyur shog /
